video_prompt: Huge airship's red propeller whirls, descending. A young woman confidently strides forward, gaze tracking the airship's descent. Blue grid lines on the ground ripple as a futuristic world unfolds around her. Smaller floating structures shift position in the background, all rendered in a continuous, flowing blueprint style as clouds drift across a clear sky.
image_prompt: Futuristic blueprint city with anime character. Giant flying multi-propeller airship, white and grey modules, detailed technical drawing style. Young woman in yellow crop top, white capris walks on grid-lined ground. Clear blue sky, scattered clouds. Blends fantasy, engineering, anime.
refined_video_prompt: A huge airship descends, its red propeller rapidly whirling. A young woman strides confidently forward, her gaze actively tracking the airship's descent. Blue grid lines ripple across the ground as a futuristic world dynamically unfolds and expands around her. Smaller floating structures continuously shift and reposition in the background. Clouds drift across the sky, with all elements animating and evolving in a continuous, flowing blueprint style.
